rules_text:
You may pay {G} and tap any number of untapped creatures you control with total power 3 or greater rather than pay this spell’s cost.
Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don’t control.
notes:
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
